initial_message: How can I help you today?
tour_message: We would love to have you visit our community.
schedule_message: When would you like to schedule your tour?
activities_message: Please tell us if you would like to learn about any of the following activities, so we can better prepare for your tour.
name_message: What is your first and last name?
email_message: What is your email address? We will use this to identify your request in our system.
tour_requested_message: Your tour has been requested. Someone will be in touch shortly to confirm whether your requested date/time is available.
care_message: What level of care are you interested in?
cell_phone_message: What is your cell phone number?
